name: Supreme Commander
notes:
Don't turn on the "Bloom" setting as it will result in a black screen for some graphic cards/driver.
Changing the resolution may crash the game or display a grey screen.
If game rendering seems to get stuck on the first frame, set the 'fidelity' setting to medium or lower.
content:
files:
- game-config: http://lutris.net/files/games/supreme-commander/Game.prefs
game:
  appid: 9350
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Gas Powered
      Games/SupremeCommander/
    src: game-config
winesteam:
  Desktop: true
